== Kadra (602605) ==
      
Kadra is a village in the [[Karwar ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 3885.49 hectares and harbouring 864 households with total population of 3250 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[KARWAR]] is at a distance of 40 km. Male population is 1648 and female population is 1602. Scheduled Caste Population is 289 and Scheduled Tribes population is 62. Census Location Code of the village is 602605<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
